about.subtitle: MabarTopup is a trusted game top up platform and reseller program in Indonesia.
about.description: MabarTopup is a reliable solution for game top ups across Indonesia. With fast, secure systems and competitive pricing, we are committed to delivering the best experience for customers and resellers. Our mission is to become the number one game top up platform with the largest trusted reseller network.
about.partner_note: With relentless focus, we keep delivering the best satisfaction for our users and clients.

service.subtitle: We provide the best services to ensure your top up business runs smoothly.

card1.title: Fast Process
card1.description: Automated systems for ultra-fast transactions, under 60 seconds with real-time notifications after payment.

card2.title: 24/7 Support
card2.description: Our support team is active 24/7 to answer questions, help with issues, and monitor transactions.

card3.title: Secure Transactions
card3.description: Encrypted payment systems with multi-layer security to keep balances and customer data safe.

card4.title: Competitive Pricing
card4.description: Best prices for resellers with attractive margins and regular weekly bundle promos.

card5.title: Comprehensive Reports
card5.description: Reseller dashboards show complete sales reports, favorite product trends, and team performance in realtime.

card6.title: Exciting Bonuses
card6.description: Bonus programs, seasonal rewards, and regular special missions to keep reseller motivation high.

faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequent questions about our reseller services.

items.question: How do I join as a Teman Mabar reseller?
items.answer: Register on our official website by tapping the 'Join as Reseller' button. Fill in the required data, complete verification, and your account will be activated shortly.

items.question: Do I need a large capital to start?
items.answer: No big capital needed. You can begin with flexible deposits that fit your needs—perfect for both new and experienced resellers.

items.question: Are there registration or monthly fees?
items.answer: There are no registration or subscription fees. You only need to top up balance to run reseller transactions.

items.question: Which payment methods are supported?
items.answer: Teman Mabar supports bank transfers, e-wallets, and QRIS. Payments are fast and balance is added immediately after a successful transaction.

items.question: How long does a top up take?
items.answer: Most top ups are processed automatically within seconds. If an issue occurs, our system or team will resolve it right away.

items.question: Is reseller support available?
items.answer: Yes, we provide reseller support via WhatsApp, live chat, and email. Our support team is ready to help anytime you face issues.
